title: How to Play Tiberium Wars With GDI

steps.headline: When you receive 3 engineers and some troops, immediately move 2 engineers to the GDI lab without any protection from infantry.
Continue towards your goal.
steps.description: When passing the power plant, use your remaining engineer to capture it. The sonic emitters that are powered up when you capture the power plant will guard your rear when you cross the bridge.

text: When you receive 3 engineers and some troops, immediately move 2 engineers to the GDI lab without any protection from infantry.  Continue towards your goal. When passing the power plant, use your remaining engineer to capture it. The sonic emitters that are powered up when you capture the power plant will guard your rear when you cross the bridge.
